captainslack:

Thanks again for the tip. We'll add information to the title to clarify that this photograph is of Ellen Axson Wilson, Woodrow Wilson's first wife.

comment.author: 50491110@N00
comment._content: What is she doing in this picture?  It looks like she is actually sitting on a step.  She has a rag in her right hand, almost suggesting she was cleaning off the step. That doesn't seem likely.

comment.author: 31181403@N00
comment._content:
Ellen Louise Axson Wilson

Born:  May 15, 1860 in Savannah, Ga
Died:  August 6, 1914 in the White House at age 54
